npcs.name: Darkwood Bandit
npcs.description: Ragged leathers patched with rope and brass buckles, short blade under a road-stained cloak. Loiters with a crooked grin, feigning ease until he lunges; nervous but vicious, always hunting for a weak moment.

npcs.name: Highroad Brigand
npcs.description: Gambeson beneath a torn highwayman’s coat, crossbelt of knives. Prowls with swagger, taunting prey to run so she can chase; cruel humor thinly veiling ruthless intent.

npcs.name: Ashfang Wolf
npcs.description: Gaunt wolf with ashen fur and ember eyes. Hackles raised, it circles prey with patience, then springs with a hungry finality.

npcs.name: Bloodfen Raider
npcs.description: Hide armor smeared in crimson, axe nicked from many kills. Roars into battle with reckless abandon, laughing through blood-slick teeth.

npcs.name: Gallows Cutthroat
npcs.description: Tattered cloak and a rope scar about the neck. Lurks with dagger loose in hand, chuckling darkly at private jokes only he finds funny.

npcs.name: Cinder Hound
npcs.description: Charred fur, breath steaming with heat. Growls low, pacing like a predator held barely by a leash, always testing the chain.

npcs.name: Hollow-Eye Cultist
npcs.description: Robes stiff with old wax and soot, eyes sunken and fever-bright. Murmurs hymns as she advances, dagger swaying like a pendulum.

npcs.name: Stonehelm Mercenary
npcs.description: Heavy mail beneath a dented breastplate, shield scarred by years of service. Fights methodically, each strike precise and deliberate, as though his foe is simply another contract.

npcs.name: Pale Marsh Ghoul
npcs.description: Skin stretched thin and gray, claws dripping marsh water. Moves in twitching bursts, then freezes to listen with a predator’s patience.

npcs.name: Ironfang Boar
npcs.description: Tusks gleaming like polished blades, hide thick with scars. Charges with reckless fury, eyes red with primal rage.

npcs.name: Grave Hollow Skeleton
npcs.description: Bones bound in rusted mail, sword hand twitching without rest. Advances steadily, with the patience of the grave.

npcs.name: Frosttusk Raider
npcs.description: White furs draped over shoulders, axe rimmed with frost. Shouts battle cries that shake snow from branches, charging with fearless momentum.

npcs.name: Shalehide Bear
npcs.description: Hide rough as rock, claws gouged with stone. Stands towering to intimidate, then crashes down like a landslide.

npcs.name: Nightveil Spy
npcs.description: Cloaked in dark silks, daggers hidden in every fold. Watches from shadows, moving with the calm patience of one who has already chosen the perfect moment to strike.

npcs.name: Ashmark Soldier
npcs.description: Chainmail scorched by old battles, tabard faded to gray. Stands in formation even when alone, disciplined to the core but weary in the eyes.

npcs.name: Bleakfen Witch
npcs.description: Tattered robes layered with swamp moss, staff knotted with bones. Speaks in riddles, cackles with delight when her hexes bite deep.

npcs.name: Crowtalon Harrier
npcs.description: Black feathers ragged from constant flight, talons gleaming wet. Circles above prey with eerie patience, striking only when panic sets in.

npcs.name: Fangtooth Raider
npcs.description: Hyena-like face split with manic laughter, patchwork armor of bone and leather. Strikes in frenzied bursts, teeth gnashing as much as his axe.

npcs.name: Hollow Mire Zombie
npcs.description: Moss-draped corpse dragging half a leg, teeth clacking mindlessly. Shambles with persistence, arms grasping for anything warm.

npcs.name: Oathbreaker Knight
npcs.description: Plate blackened and unadorned, tabard torn from disgrace. He stands proud but bitter, fighting with grim resolve to prove loyalty never mattered.

npcs.name: Howling Warg
npcs.description: Massive wolf with scarred muzzle, howling to unsettle prey. Its eyes shine with cunning, its stance aggressive and dominant.

npcs.name: Duskfen Thief
npcs.description: Leather jerkin darkened with swamp oils, twin knives at the ready. She sneers as she darts forward, every move born of hunger and spite.

npcs.name: Ashdrift Corsair
npcs.description: Salt-stained coat and boots, cutlass sharp with sea-worn scars. Laughs as he fights, scent of rum clinging even to his blade.

npcs.name: Mournshade Acolyte
npcs.description: Robes stitched with sigils, eyes ringed with sleepless shadows. Recites prayers to dark gods even as she bleeds, smiling at every strike against her.

npcs.name: Fellpine Tracker
npcs.description: Cloaked in pine-green leathers, bow strung tight. Silent and disciplined, his arrows land before his footsteps are heard.

npcs.name: Ashen Charger
npcs.description: A skeletal horse wreathed in ash and smoke, hooves striking sparks. It rears with defiance, eyes burning with ghostly flame.

npcs.name: Wraithveil Stalker
npcs.description: Cloaked in spectral rags, form half in shadow. Flickers between sight and absence, voice whispering with a hunger that chills the soul.

npcs.name: Ashfang Boar Rider
npcs.description: Heavy axe in one hand, reins clutched in the other. His boar snorts and stamps, tusks clashing as he bellows challenges with brutal pride.

npcs.name: Duskmire Assassin
npcs.description: Black leathers tight to the skin, twin daggers gleaming. She breathes steady, her gaze unflinching as if already rehearsing where the blade will slip between ribs.

npcs.name: Frostvein Raider
npcs.description: Wolf pelts around his shoulders, axe rimed with frost. He fights with primal fury, every swing a test of strength and stubborn will.

npcs.name: Hollowspire Sorcerer
npcs.description: Robes black as cinders, hands wreathed in violet flame. He speaks in cold tones, every word dripping with contempt and dark wisdom.

npcs.name: Ashfang Bear
npcs.description: Fur streaked with ash, muzzle blackened with soot. It stands with raw menace, claws gouging deep into the soil as it bellows.

npcs.name: Rotfen Cannibal
npcs.description: Skin scarred with crude carvings, loincloth stiff with blood. He crouches low, licking cracked lips, muttering prayers to hunger.

npcs.name: Crowveil Archer
npcs.description: Feathered cloak, longbow strung taut. She moves like the birds she imitates, striking with grace, gone before the body falls.

npcs.name: Shatterjaw Troll
npcs.description: Massive frame with mottled hide, jaw broken and regrown jagged. Lumbers forward with laughter like rocks grinding, every blow cracking earth.

npcs.name: Blackfen Warlock
npcs.description: Dark robes threaded with swamp reeds, staff tipped with skull. His voice is calm, his spells cruel, and his patience endless.

npcs.name: Emberhide Wolf
npcs.description: Coat streaked with ember-like markings, eyes glowing faintly. Moves in coordinated packs, attacking with precision and savage joy.

npcs.name: Dreadfen Lurker
npcs.description: Corpse wrapped in reeds, face hidden by mud. Waits half-submerged until prey wanders too close, then drags them screaming into the mire.

npcs.name: Ashfang Stag
npcs.description: Antlers charred and twisted, breath smoking in the air. Stands regal yet aggressive, stomping before lowering horns to gore.

npcs.name: Blightmire Shaman
npcs.description: Skin painted with ash symbols, staff crowned with crow bones. She chants in rasping tones, calling on foul spirits to curse and maim.
